bibl.title: Letter from L.H. Baekeland to L.O. Howard, May 5, 1924

div1.p: Baekeland inquires if Howard objects to him writing a letter to the New York Times.

div1.head: Letter from L.H. Baekeland to L.O. Howard, May 5, 1924
div1.opener:
FROM L. O. HOWARD
OR LUCY HOWARD
(COPY)
AMERICAN CHEMICAL SOCIETY
247 Park Avenue
New York City
May 5, 1924.
Dr. L. O. Howard
Chief of Bureau of Entomology
United States Department of Agriculture
Washington, D. C.
Dear Dr. Howard:
div1.p:
Have you any objection if I write a letter to the
New York Times as per the enclosed copy?
div1.closer:
Cordially yours, (Signed) L. H. Baekeland,
President.
